source.9293a46b:
import rx
from rx import operators as ops

source = rx.of("Apple", "Orange", "PineApple", "Melon", "Strawberry")

composed = source.pipe(
    ops.map(lambda s: len(s))
)
composed.subscribe(lambda value: print("Received {0}".format(value)))
source.b67e4242:
import rx
from rx import operators as ops

source = rx.of("Apple", "Orange", "PineApple", "Melon", "Strawberry")

composed = source.pipe(
    ops.map(lambda s: len(s)),
    ops.filter(lambda i: i >= 6)
)
composed.subscribe(lambda value: print("Received {0}".format(value)))
source.698cd5b9:
import rx
from rx import operators as ops

source = rx.of("Apple", "Orange", "PineApple", "Melon", "Strawberry")

composed = source.pipe(
    ops.filter(lambda s: len(s) >= 6),
   
)
composed.subscribe(lambda value: print("Received {0}".format(value)))
